resources.string: You are about to delete the group of %1$s. You will lose all entries in the group. Are you sure? Are you sure? Are you sure?\n\ \n\ If it is okay, please push \"%2$s\". If it is wrong, push \"%3$s\".
You are about to delete the entry of %1$s. Are you sure? Are you sure? Are you sure?\n\ \n\ If it is okay, please push \"%2$s\". If it is wrong, push \"%3$s\".
Give a name of the new group.
